scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run client:dev" "NODE_ENV=development npm run server:dev"
scripts.lint: npm run client:lint && npm run server:lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run client:lint:fix && npm run server:lint:fix
scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.postinstall: (cd server && npm install); (cd client && npm install)
scripts.heroku-postbuild: (cd client && npm install && npm run build); (cd server && npm install && npm run build)
